additional_notes: New York State does not require a specific number of continuing education hours for license renewal, but does require completion of specific mandatory courses. The Infection Control course must be completed every four years, and the Child Maltreatment course is a one-time requirement. Nurses with prescriptive authority must complete the Pain Management, Palliative Care, and Addiction course every three years.
